1: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -export([init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, all/0]).
    4: -export([add_service/1]).
    5: 
    6: 
    7: all() -> [add_service].
    8: 
    9: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   10: 	Priv = ?config(piv_dir, Config),
   11: 	application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   12: 	mafiapp:install([node()]),
   13: 	application:start(mnesia),
   14: 	application:start(mafiapp),
   15: 	Config.
   16: 
   17: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   18: 	application:stop(mnesia),
   19: 	ok.
   20: 
   21: add_service(_Config) ->
   22: 	{error, unknown_friend} = mafiapp:add_service("from_name",
   23: 													"to_name",
   24: 													{1946,5,23},
   25: 													"a fake service"),
   26: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   27: 	ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Alan Parsons",
   28: 							[{twitter, "@ArtScienceSound"}],
   29: 							[{born, {1948,12,20}},
   30: 							musician, 'audio engineer',
   31: 							producer, 'has projects'], mixing),
   32: 	ok = mafiapp:add_service("Alan Parsons", "Don Corleone", {1973,3,1}, "Helped releasea Pink Floyd album").
